import React from "react" import "./index.scss" import {Card, Col, Container, Row} from "react-bootstrap"; import {LineChart, Tooltip,XAxis,CartesianGrid,Line} from "recharts" import data from "../data.json" export default function Index() { console.log(data); return (

2019 Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV)

Last updated: {data.lastUpdatedAt}

 ) } const Chart = ({title, subtitle, data}) => { return {title}

{subtitle}

 }
